metadata.name: STEP DOWN #1
metadata.description:
We all know the impact that the last 2 years has had on our industry and being a part of it shifted something inside me. I was introspective - reevaluating the meaning of my artistry, my place in the world, while the collective noise was loud and intrusive. Restricted but yearning to be seen, heard & understood more than ever. I began to create tracks that demanded attention & took up space. Simultaneously, I emerged from hiding my public identity. I started the BRUX project masked so I could deflect my gender, deflect being a novelty as a “female producer” in the electronic scene. 

Step Down is the upcoming release off of my ‘Take’ EP on Deadbeats this Spring - it follows on from singles “Covet” and “Take ft. Kimbra” that were written during my energetic shift in 2020. Step Down embodies that phase of energy - demanding space and attention at any cost. It’s the aggravated voice of someone needing to be seen & understood “Step down, it’s my crown. No room for you and me…”

In early 2021, I began to shift my focus to web3. After many months of watching from the sidelines, I entered the space late last year after being nominated as an FWB fellowship artist. I’ve learnt quickly just how much room there is for expression & autonomy in web3 and it’s unlocked a whole new playground in my brain. I’ve since released highly intricate 3d artworks as a collection of NFTs that once had no forum other than web2 PFPs & DSP(Spotify etc) packshots, experimenting with generative music via coding & released a full length music video clip for recent single Take. 

I am absolutely thrilled to be dropping my new single Step Down exclusively on Sound.xyz ahead of its official release and hope you enjoy its vibration x
